post.content:
Info : DB2/CISS/COBOL, Full time position ...


Hi;

If you have DB2/CICS/COBOL skill set and interested in a Full time position,

please send a resume to 'stevenkim@home.com'.

Please note that I will be just passing your resume on to my contact.

(I do not have anything to do with the hiring.)
